mil3.3.3:0.1_0: The Simile of the Making Hand
mil3.3.3:1.2_0: “Since it is the formerly you said that dragon?”
mil3.3.3:1.3_0: “Because, great king, judged in the past.”
mil3.3.3:1.5_0: “Great king, whatever are seen with wisdom is evident.”
mil3.3.3:1.7_0: “Because this, great king, insignificant thing, no matter what transmigration has no known beginning. And what’s known and seen with wisdom.”
mil3.3.3:2.1_0: “When there was a dragon, what was it that craveled. Do you remember any of these things, what you have realized?”
mil3.3.3:2.2_0: “Great king, which has cut off the shadow of the both ends through both sides?”
mil3.3.3:2.4_0: “Sir, I’m not able to ask you about this?”
mil3.3.3:3.2_0: The senior monk who had a tree felled out, “The entire mass of suffering has been a mass of suffering.”
mil3.3.3:5.1_0: The third with joined palms is finished.
